content.detailedDescription: Field investigator mufon  id #7606 kcmo ,james ,a,tutt,jr , this not the 1thtime of ufo sighting i sent report on  09/27/2001 about this very same typeofsighting, i was traveling east on 87th ,street in,kansas city,mo 01100hourssat-11/10/2001 i saw a cigar shaped craft it was in  a standinghovering notmoving making no3c3c3c city - zoo -3e3e3e 3th largest -zoo in usa.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 8 that night every thing was calm and clear we were driving home ona hilly road.Then my mom then i saw a siluwet of an object i syudyed it as muchas possble but it was gone with in 45sec. the object was in the shap of a conewith a pointed tip and one light at that tip the back of the object had 2 wingsthe shape unknown and there was 1 light on each end the object the feeling wasof normalsy because we have had other sightings in that area with otherpeople.The wings i want to say are/were on the very bake of the object.Theobject flew in a spiraling motion downward at a rate that no human couldwithstand the it dissapered.Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalentto 1 typed page).
content.summary: Night driving on road i saw silouwet of object
Sighted silent delta shape with large disc lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from an event when i saw a bright light which looked like astar in the sky. i then noticed that it started to decend rapidly. i thought itmight be an airplane about to crash. then it came close enough that i could makeout a shape. it was as tall as an airplane would be stood on its side (wing towing). it was rectangular in shape. it looked like it was going to crash intothe ground near the highway, so i stopped my car thinking i was about to see anexplosion. then as it approached the ground i saw a red light at the bottom andthe light fizzled as the object disappeared. it was as if it entered the placewhere the red light was and did not come out of the bottom. the thing that icould liken it to would be a huge rectangular meteor that burned up just beforeit hit the ground.
content.summary: Large falling rectangular object fizzles and vanis

content.detailedDescription: I was at my cousin chris house.  he lives on top of a hill.  he has seen theseufos before and he knows what time they come - 10 pm est.  so we were standingout in the yard waiting.  we saw one.  it was v-shaped and had lights that gotbrighter.  it would hover at treetop level.  it would go fast and then sometimesstop.  the colors of the lights seemed to go from a white to a yellow.  wewatched it for maybe 15 minutes and it was gone.  weve been looking for themlately and havent seen them.  im sure theyll be back.
content.summary: I saw a v-shaped craft with lights.

content.detailedDescription: Witnesss account:at around 2330 on 6/16/01 i took my two dalmations out for a briefwalk. i live on a corner lot next to a large park. i was standing at thecorner waiting for my dogs to catch up, when i saw what i thought was alightning bug across the street at the park. i followed this green/yellowish light as it went streight up slowly. when i first saw it, thelight was already above the tree line, so i couldnt tell how close itwas. i thought it odd that it wasnt flickering, just getting smaller. then thelight started moving south to north. i never heard a sound as it flew itscourse. i thoughtit must be a heliocopter and didnt take my eyes off of it because ithought it was interesting that i couldnt hear it yet. as it got midwaybetween the park and my house i could tell that it was not assending anylonger and i could see some reflection from the city lights on theunderside of the craft. its then when i couldnt belive what i wasseeing. i saw a round saucer shape with only one green yellowish lightat the rear of the object. as it went north ii was able to follow itnorth untill it slowly went out of sight. i thought to myself, did ijust see what i thought i saw! i could not tell how high the craft was,how fast it was moving, or hear any sound at all. i do know that thecloud deck that night was around 8000 ft asl. and winds aloft were lessthan 5 knots. the craft never went behind the clouds the whole time thati saw it, so i know it was under 8000 ft. i,ve never seen anything likethis before....Ever!
content.summary: Green-yellowish light seen in oak park, michigan

content.detailedDescription: .Witness account: i had attended a meeting of the lake superior writers at thedewitt-seitz building in canal park that afternoon.  i took the duluth  transitauthority bus home and got off at the corner of piedmont avenue and west seventhstreet at 5:20 p.M.  it was dark but there was still a glimmer of blue dusk atthe summit of spirit mountain, on the western edge of the city.  as i crossedpiedmont avenue, i looked downhill to my left and saw that the full moon hadjust risen.  it was about 10 degrees above the eastern horizon, over lakesuperior and park point.  it was very cold, about zero degrees fahrenheit, andthe sky was completely clear.As i passed the lakeside ice co. building, i saw what i thought was a christmasdecoration through the pine trees, an arch of multicolored lights.  afterwalking about 100 feet (30 meters) west on west seventh, i saw the object moreclearly.It was a black triangle, with its apex pointed upward at one oclock angle, andthe base at the bottom.  the object was in mid-air, and estimated 35 degreesabove the southwestern horizon.  it was the size of my thumbnail at armslength.  the color was matte black, a shade darker than the surrounding nightsky. the object had no discernible motion and hovered silently.  there was nosound.The sides of the triangle were slightly rounded, a bit concave, giving theobject the look of a bulky arrowhead.  also there were three sets or arrays offour lights each on either side of the triangle. there were no lights at thebottom. twelve lights in all on either side. in descending order, the lights ineach array were red, green, gold and white.I halted at the corner of west seventh and 22nd avenue west and observed theobject for five minutes. it was hard to judge distance, but my guess is that theobject was a few miles away, possibly over the spirit valley area in the westduluth section of the city. i was alone on the street.  there was intermittenttraffic on piedmont avenue a block behind me.  i walked on to my home, wentinside and grabbed a small camera.  i wasnt sure the object itself would show,but i knew the steady multicolored lights would. however, when i reached thefront porch again, the object was gone.
content.summary: Ufo roundup editor reports triangular craft

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the sky while my dogs got their nightly exercise.  very dimlights traveling across the sky caught my peripheral vision.  there were 4 or 5of them that seemed to come from a long object traveling very quickly from northto south at about 60 deg from horiz.  it was silent.  i could see the lights for4 or 5 seconds then lost it in the glare from the ford dealership lights.  wheni first saw i thought it was a shooting star but it was too dim and had too manylights. i watched the object rapt in curiosity.  i let the dogs run around somemore then brought them in and told my wife what i saw.
content.summary: Saw long ship with very dim lights traveling very quickly.

content.detailedDescription: we were at a show as you like it at the aart whenall of a sudden in the midst of a great monologue, the magenta ship camecrashing through the control booth from behind and down into the audience. several people must have been vaporized immediately, as no deceased werethereafter found. could you possibly help us and share what hapopens at the endof the play, we never got to see the ending.Thank you for you prompthelp.Sincerely,james gobbs
content.summary: American repertory theatre in cambridge, ma   saw

content.detailedDescription: my mother paula entered my room to show me theobject and we went out side to veiw it, it was oval shaped and and verybright.It stayed hovering in the sky about 10 degrees to the left of oriens beltto the east it then started to slowly desend to tree top level we could stillsee the object thru the trees .We live in danbury ct and this object appeared todesend to brookfield ct.
content.summary: My mother and i had just seen a ufo in danbury ct,
Brown dot or small object, hovered, then headed nw

content.detailedDescription: I got these shots while my friend and i were coming down sandia.  youll see inthe picture a plane smoke trail.. to the left of it is an object.  at first wefigured it was a star, but after driving for about 10 minutes we could tell itwasnt because a cloud had moved from behind it, and stars cant have cloudsbehind them  it may have been a chopper, it was relatively stationairy for thetime we watched it, i kept taking pictures until my batteries died from the restof the day.  these were originally part of the november 2nd shots at the end ofthe day.
content.summary: Bright object on horizon, took pictures of object.

content.detailedDescription: 1.)driving home from watseka to chebanse illinois. 2.)it was hovering aboveus.3.)it was a ufo4.)stop car, got out to get good look, excited, happy, afraid,wanted to look for evermore.5.)cylindar shape, hover, came close, hover, zoomedaway6.)because it seemed to come closer, was afraid, got back in car, started todrive, it zoomed away.
content.summary: Ufo watseka il

content.detailedDescription: a massive obilisk landed in a field near mycollege campus at the state university of new york at new paltz. i was alone inthe field, but not under the  influence of anything.It was black as it landed,but lightened to grayish silver after landing. a door  opened, a small being,also grayish silver peeked out and took a black netting device (like a poolcleaner) and swiped through the air. the door closed and the obilisk liftedstraight up and was gone.Im very scared. ive never been someone who believed.If you call, please let whoever picks up know why youre calling. im anxious totalk to people who understand.
content.summary: Tall ship lands, door opens, net appears, flies aw.

content.detailedDescription: i was out side on the deck sitting in a rockingchair smoking a cigarette .I leaned back in the chair and looked at the sky andnoticed a strange contrail it was like a dotted line .I thought it was a jetwith some sort of engine problemso i went inside and grabbed my binoculars(busnell 7x50)when i came back out side i lokekd up at the object and could notsee a tail nor could i see any wings the object traveled in a straight line fromsw to ne  was very far up  and was silent.  thanks jwdance
content.summary: Odd object, wierd contrail

content.detailedDescription: monday  nov. 5th  i was at my mothers house i wentoutside to smoke a cigarette .It was near sunset i sat down in a chair (arocking chair) and as i was leaning back i looked up and noticed a odd contrail.I looked at hard but it was pretty far up in the sky .I went inside and grabedmy binoculars and went back outside. (bushnell 7x50) the object itself had noapparent tail and no apparent wingsi belive it was silvery refective but ilooked orange with the naked eye and with the binoculars( sunset?)it lookedcigar shaped. the two odd things1 it was completly silent 2 it had one shortsteady contrail and one contrail that was leaving a dotted line i watched it forabout two or less minutesi walked around the side and then the front of thehouse till it dissappered from my view wittness 2 was my mother ..She cameoutside when i grabbed my binoculars she was wondering what i was looking at .
content.summary: Tail less,wingless craft with a dotted line contra
Lighted objects of varying size,with physical reac

content.detailedDescription: The witness was referred to us by his son, who had met the investigator during acase several years ago.  the witness is a retired employee of the soo linerailroad. he had taken a part-time job with the allina medical group as a nightjanitor at one of their clinics in hastings, minnesota.The witness was walking out of the clinic carrying bags to a dumpster when hisattention was directed to eight spherical lights in the northern sky. subjectively, he felt that each of the lights appeared to be the size of thefull moon, that they were possibly 200 - 300 feet away from him at an altitudeof 200 feet and at an angle of 45 degrees from horizontal to vertical.  it was alittle before 11:00 pm.  he estimated that the actual size of each object wassimilar to that of a washtub.The interesting aspect of this encounter was the odd behavior of the objects. they would be briefly located in pairs at the 12:00, 3:00, 6:00, and 9:00 clockpositions, then quickly move simultaneously in a clockwise circular path to newpositions 180 degrees on the opposite side of the circle.  the path was circularwith respect to him as he looked up into the sky at a possible 45 degree angle.The witness watched them for a while and then walked back into the clinic tocontinue his work.  as he did so, it was his impression that the group movedparallel with him while continuing their rapid intermittent circling around acommon center.After working for a few minutes he decided to go out and see them again.  theywere still there and doing their maneuver.  he went back into the clinic, butwhile he was working, would walk over to a window from time to time and look outto still see the objects in the sky.  once more he went outside to observe theformation, but they were no longer to be seen.  the entire incident had lastedfor something in excess of 20 minutes.From inside the building he called the sheriff to inquire if there were anyreports of lights in the sky, but there had not been.
content.summary: Retired railroad worker sees tightly maneuvering l

content.detailedDescription: I was on the balcony when the objectappeared it was disc shapped, i saw the red running lights, it was quiet, ithoovered above the trees then took off.
content.summary: It was low hoovering trees no sound red running li
Saw shiny object 1962

content.detailedDescription: at approximately 7pm 11/3/01 my wife and i heard alow flying jet aircraft circling our development. upon going outside to see whatwas going on, we only found the moon and stars and the sound of the circlingaircraft now in the distance. then we noticed a pulsing whitish blue light thecolor of the new car xenon beams. the light was flying erratic and low in thesky (it reminded me of the way a small bird or sparrow flys) and did a largecircle over the development.Then about 7:05pm the jet aircraft was back andfollowing the light. the plane was low enough to actually see the aircraftilluminated by its green red and white lights,looked like an f-16. both airplaneand the light flew north east and went out of sight. 11/3/01 7:35 pmbyronanthony
content.summary: Ufo ocean city md
2 round objects rotating white to black to star li

content.detailedDescription: i was leaving the store and i noticed a brightlight in the eastern sky it appeared to be moving very slowly.It was far up inthe sky but it was about the size of a quarter i watched it for about 3min.Itstayed the same color.
content.summary: I saw a large round bright light in the eastern sk

content.detailedDescription: As i was on my break from work, i was driving around the park finishing mycigarette. as i drove up a short, but steep hill i was looking at some fairlylow-lying clouds when all of the sudden a large ball of glowing blue/green lightpierced through the bottom of the clouds going very, very fast almost directlyover me. it passed back into the clouds not even a second after it appeared. itmad no sound that i could hear, but visually the glow of the craft appeared tohum with light and energy. i said holy24hit to my self and came to a stop right on this hill. it didnt even occur tome to follow it for a second or two. my first gut reaction was that it might ofbeen a crashing plane, but it was just the angle i was at on the hill.  it wasactually heading in a strait line due south-west. my three other friends werenorth of town in the country and only saw the light through the clouds in thesouth-western horizon. all of them agree that it moved across the sky fasterthat anything theyve seen. i was surprised to learn that they saw the samething! im going to encourage them to report it also, which is why i left themanonomys.
content.summary: A glowing blue ball of light very quickly passed o

content.detailedDescription: i was parked at meriden markhaim airport7bsmall7d taking pictures of the cometwhen i saw a plane in the west towards the moon.Then i saw a disc hovering just over the moon off on the horizon. the planelooked like it was circlingunder the moon to the left of the object, as theplane aproched the objectthe object sped off towards the northwest. declining onthe horizon it looked to be breaking apart and burst into flames, then no trace.The plane flew offto the west and faded out of sight.  i have six picturestotal, two of the comet and four of the object. at the time my camera was new tome and i was trying out the different settings. each of the pictures are fromthe differentsettings. but very clear. i also had a sighting in upper new yorkstate back in 1983. but little info on that encounter.
content.summary: Moon,plane and ?

content.detailedDescription: we were driving north on hwy 201 north. we were4miles north of mountain home, arkansas - we are in the center-top of state and10 miles south of missouri border.  it was 8:35p.M.We were startled by the light- we didnt expect to see a light there in the night sky.We thought it was amedior when we first saw it.Al needed to continue to drive at 55 miles per hour. we called out, what is that!  we saw a bright light move streight from east towest at a 35 degree angle to the horizon.  above the west horizon it entered acloud-mist then droped streight down to the tree level.  i had made animpossible right angle turn - down.  we then knew it was not a metior.Itdisapeared infront of the tree line about less than 500 feet from the road.
content.summary: Saw white light
Picture of  round light green cirle thing also blu

content.detailedDescription: The prime subjects of this investigation were anomalous images on twophotographs.The 15 year-old son was trying out a new digital camera.  he took pictures ofsome cloud formations.  neither he nor his father saw any anomalous objects. when the pictures were downloaded into the computer, an anomalous objectappeared in two of them.  the object is very small in one, but appearsdisc-shaped in the other.Because the object appears to be headed downward at a steep angle, the mother ofthe family came to believe the object had crashed into the swamp.  she also hadother reasons for believing something had crashed nearby.  first of all, sheheard noises for three of four nights afterwards.  she described these noises ashigh-pitched squeaky sounds.  she had no tape recorder, so was unable to recordthese noises.  the prime investigator thinks these noises may have been birdsor frogs, which start to make a lot of noise around four a.M. that time ofyear.Also, the mother observed what she called a ufo, which was visible in theeastern sky for several nights, at about the same spot every night.  it appearedabout 3:00 a.M. at about 35 degrees elevation every morning, and traveled fromnorth to south.  the prime investigator has determined that this was most likelyvenus.  i would concur, and consider this probably identified.A few days after the pictures were taken, the neighbors son witnessed some menpouring something into the swamp.  according to the witness, they were dressedin unusual suits.  one possible explanation could be that these men were from anenvironmental agency and were pouring dye into the water to measure the waterflow.  there is concern about ground water contamination from nearby mines.The mother also claims that her children have seen glowing figures approximatelyfour feet tall when camping overnight in the backyard.
content.summary: Two pictures of possible disk taken on digital cam
